original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at Rs328.00/20, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 328.00/20 to the US dollar Monday, from 327.90/328.10 on Friday, dealers said, while bonds yields were steady.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 14.50/75 percent almost unchanged from 14.55/75 percent Friday.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.60/75 percent from 14.70/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.55/70 percent down from 14.70/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.70/85 percent from 14.75/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.55/70 percent, up from 14.30/60 percent. (Colombo/Nov20/2023)
